name: LD43 - Necromancer
description:
Submitted as part of Ludum Dare 43: Sacrifices must be made

How to play:

- use the basic attack to turn the attacking hero's into undead servants
- these undead servants can act as distractions or as shields for your protection.
- once enough undead servants have been made you can sacrifice them to cast more powerful magic
- 5 Souls, heal 25 points of damage
- 10 Souls, increase the damage done by basic attack
- 20 Souls, lightning Bolt Area of Effect

Controls:

- W,A,S,D: move around
- Arrow Keys: Directional Shooting
- 1: Sacrifice minions for health
- 2: Sacrifice minions for extra damage
- 3: Sacrifice minions for lightning area of effect attack

Tools Used:
- GameEngine: Unity3D version 2018.2.17f1
- IDE: Visual Studio 2017
- Graphics: GIMP 2.8.18

Change Log:
- 20:30 03/12 fixed issue where enemies would not change target once target died and another where enemies would spawned in unable to attack.
